seed_pair.target: Para comprobar si has podido terminar.
seed_pair.known: To check if you've been able to finish.

S0515: En el primer día del año nuevo.
On the first day of the new year.
S0516: They both came on their own.
S0517: Pero se fueron el uno con el otro.
But they left with each other.
S0518: No podría imaginarme teniendo exactamente el mismo problema.
I couldn't imagine myself having exactly the same problem.
S0519: No he visto a su nuevo bebé todavía.
I haven't seen their new baby yet.
S0520: Podría haberle pasado a toda la familia.
It might have happened to the whole family.
S0521: Tengo miedo de que olvides por qué necesitábamos quedarnos aquí.
I'm afraid that you'll forget why we needed to stay here.
S0522: Acordemos que fue estúpido decir la verdad.
Let's agree that it was stupid to tell the truth.
S0523: En lugar de dar una excusa.
S0524: Te llamaré de vuelta en tres o cuatro minutos.
I'll call you back in three or four minutes.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
